about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Mrs. Bectors Food Specialities Ltd is one of the leading companies in the premium bakery segment and premium and mid-premium biscuit segment in North India. The company's product portfolio mainly consists of two categories of products; Biscuits (cookies, creams, crackers, digestive, etc.) and Bakery products (bread, buns, pizza bases, cakes, etc.).

Mrs. Bectors manufactures and sells biscuits under its brand name "Mrs. Bector's Cremica" whereas bakery products are manufactured under the brand name of "English Oven" and offered in the premium market segments such as Delhi NCR, Mumbai, and Bengaluru. As of June 30, 2020, its bakery segment has a total of 96 products and the Biscuits segment has a total of 384 items.

All of its products are manufactured in-house across 6 strategically located manufacturing units in 5 different cities i.e. Maharashtra, Karnataka, UP, Himachal Pradesh, and Punjab. The company has a very strong distribution network of 154 super-stockists and 644 distributors supplying products through 458,000 retail outlets and 3,594 preferred outlets. It sells its products to 23 states in India and also exports its products under its own brand name and third-party private labels to 64 countries all over the world.

Competitive Strengths

  • A leader in biscuits and bakery segments in North India.
  • Well-diversified product portfolio.
  • Major food certifications i.e. BRC, USFDA, and FSSC.
  • Leading biscuits exporter to 64 countries.
  • Modern production process.
  • Strong sales and distribution network.

faqs.question: What is the Mrs. Bectors Food IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mrs. Bectors Food IPO is a main-board IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹540.54 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹288 per share. The minimum order quantity is 50.

The IPO opens on December 15, 2020, and closes on December 17, 2020.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mrs. Bectors Food IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mrs. Bectors Food IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mrs. Bectors Food IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mrs. Bectors Food IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mrs. Bectors Food IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mrs. Bectors Food IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mrs. Bectors Food IPO opens on December 15, 2020 and closes on December 17, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mrs. Bectors Food IPO?
faqs.answer: Mrs. Bectors Food IPO lot size is 50, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mrs. Bectors Food IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mrs. Bectors Food IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Mrs. Bectors Food IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Mrs. Bectors Food IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 22, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, December 23, 2020. Check the Mrs. Bectors Food IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Mrs. Bectors Food IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Mrs. Bectors Food IPO listing date is on Thursday, December 24, 2020.
